attributes.action: Add part-time workers and single parents to the Anti-Discrimination Laws of this Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout my time being both of the above I have found there to be a lot of discrimination in the work place and in normal life against these two states of being.  There are laws against all other types of discrimination and I feel that the above should be outlined in the same way.
